description: Enhanced prompt with conceptual assessment methodology, model introspection workflow, and rich analytical commentary requirements
features: Model introspection workflow - prevents LLMs from fabricating model versions
Conceptual assessment methodology - semantic understanding over keyword counting
Three-step analysis process: theme extraction → centrality assessment → holistic scoring
Enhanced commentary requirements with 5 analytical dimensions
improvements_over_previous: Prevents LLM model version fabrication through introspection workflow
Sophisticated conceptual assessment over surface-level analysis
Rich analytical commentary requirements across 5 dimensions
Better handling of model attribution and metadata
